about_content: Wisdom dictionary is considered to be the one in its kind, containing the most available words and it has been made up throughout five years, relying on the widely approved dictionaries such as Oxford, MacMillan, Collins, Cambridge and Longman dictionaries. It includes more than 80 000 words and phrases it owns several key features which will definitely be found useful by English learners. Besides a rich and complete English and Uzbek word list, amazing features in the app like Grammar and Collocation allow users to gain valuable information regarding how to use the words in actual situations and explain grammar rules briefly and clearly. Furthermore, almost every word is followed by real examples making it easier and more efficient to remember and to use. Moreover, Wisdom Dictionary has its own way of giving a clue about the difference and comparisons between close words, in terms of meaning, with the help of Thesaurus and Difference bar. In order to have an extra understanding of the word, one needs to have idea about feedback and real meaning of the word. Additional features like Metaphor and Culture gives you this opportunity. Another remarkable aspect of this app is that it includes Synonyms and Antonyms of nearly every word, more than any other dictionary apps available. Surely, it helps users to analyze and compare the words, being got remembered the other words simultaneously. Shortly, Wisdom dictionary can be called an encyclopedia of English and Uzbek words and phrases as it is granted with all necessary features required by English learners. This dictionary was written and created by Abdullaev Khasanboy and Abdullayev Khusanboy who are claimed the creators of other English learning apps and books, and the founders of Wisdom language courses. They graduated Management Development Institute of Singapore in Tashkent in 2012 and at the present, they are working on further innovative educational projects. For technical support, suggestions and complaints - support@wisdomedu.uz All rights reserved © 2020 Wisdom Dictionary Developed by Simpl Solution
